name: GOLDEN PARADISE
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys 2022.1 game jam event by Ismail Alsaad (me)

the game is about a human civilization whose economy had crashed and lost all of it's gold supply, as you look through your small telescope you spot that a new bright yellow dot have appeared in the sky and it turns out that's it's a planet made entirely from gold
as you were the first one to spot the planet they made you their leader and commander to operate a mission trying to take the gold reserves of the planet and bring it back to earth.

Disclaimer:  (this game was made in a time window of 3 days instead of the intended 7 days by the hosts of the event, this shortening of the time frame was because of me being busy with school and exams and so I didn't have as much time as I would have wanted.)
